fr.gouv.vitam.common.client

Interface OperationManagementClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, MockOrRestClient, VitamAutoCloseable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IngestInternalClient, ProcessingManagementClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IngestInternalClientMock, ProcessingManagementClientMock

    public interface OperationManagementClient
extends MockOrRestClient
    OperationManagementClient include all common method between ProcessManagement and Ingest Internal
